title: MLC 2024 Schedule, Squad, Venue, Timing ‚Äì Major League Cricket
body:
MLC 2024 Schedule: The second edition of the Major League Cricket will start on July 5 with the finals on July 28. As of last season, the entire tournament will be hosted at two venues ‚Äì Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas and Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.

Major League Cricket 2024

MLC 2024 will follow round robin and playoffs format where the top 4 teams of the points table will advance to the playoffs round. A total of 6 teams will feature in the Major League Cricket 2024 and 25 matches will be played including an Eliminator, Qualifier, Challenger and a Final.

MLC 2024 Schedule

The first match of the season will be played between defending champions MI New York and Seattle Orcas on July 5 in Church Street Park, Morrisville. The final of the tournament will be played on July 28 in Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas.

MLC 2024 Squad

A minimum of 16 players and a maximum of 19 players can be selected by the teams with a maximum of nine overseas players.

Los Angeles Knight Riders

Saif Badar, Unmukt Chand, Derone Davis, Corn√© Dry, Adithya Ganesh, Spencer Johnson, Ali Khan, Nitish Kumar, Sunil Narine, Jason Roy, Andre Russell, Matthew Tromp, Shadley van Schalkwyk, Adam Zampa

MI New York

Ehsan Adil, Trent Boult, Dewald Brevis, Ruben Clinton, Tim David, Shayan Jahangir, Nosthush Kenjige, Rashid Khan, Anrich Nortje, Monank Patel, Kieron Pollard, Nicholas Pooran, Kagiso Rabada, Heath Richards, Romario Shepherd, Steven Taylor, Rushil Ugarkar

San Francisco Unicorns

Seattle Orcas

Texas Super Kings

Devon Conway, Faf du Plessis, Aaron Hardie, Milind Kumar, Aiden Markram, Daryl Mitchell, Saiteja Mukkamalla, Mohammad Mohsin, Raj Nannan, Mitchell Santner, Calvin Savage, Zia Shahzad, Cameron Stevenson, Joshua Tromp, Zia-ul-Haq

Washington Freedom

MLC 2024 Venue

title: Complete Schedule for MLC 2024 Announced by Major League Cricket
body:
The Major League Cricket (MLC) is all set for its second season, and the complete schedule has been announced. The upcoming season will commence on July 5th, bringing with it an increase in excitement and anticipation among cricket enthusiasts worldwide.

This year‚Äôs edition promises to be bigger than ever before. Six additional league matches have been added to the tournament‚Äôs roster as per the organizers‚Äô announcement made on Tuesday. This expansion of games showcases MLC‚Äôs commitment towards promoting cricket in a country where baseball, basketball, and football reign supreme.

Cricket fans can look forward to more action-packed performances from their favorite teams this season due to these extra matches. It also means that each team will get more opportunities to prove their mettle on the field while providing thrilling entertainment for spectators.

But there‚Äôs even more! Following the league stage filled with intense competition between top-notch teams vying for supremacy, there will be a four-match playoff series held at Grand Stadium üèüÔ∏è . These playoffs are expected to bring out some of the most exciting moments of MLC 2024 as they lead up to determining who takes home the championship title this year.

Each match holds significance as every victory or loss could potentially change rankings within fractions of points‚Äîmaking every game crucially important not just for players but also sports analysts predicting outcomes based upon past performance records combined with current form factors affecting individual player capabilities during gameplay scenarios unfolding live under pressure-cooker situations often encountered when playing high-stakes professional sporting events such as these!

In short: if you‚Äôre a fan passionate about cricket‚Äîor even if you‚Äôre new but curious about what makes this sport so globally loved‚Äîyou won‚Äôt want miss out witnessing firsthand how drama unfolds throughout course entire tournament culminating into ultimate finale where only one team emerges victorious claiming much-coveted trophy symbolizing pinnacle achievement within world-class competitive arena known universally amongst followers around globe simply referred ‚ÄúThe Game.‚Äù

So mark calendars now ensuring you don‚Äôt miss out on any of the action that MLC 2024 promises to deliver. Whether it‚Äôs a nail-biting finish between two evenly matched teams, an underdog story of triumph against all odds, or a display of exceptional individual brilliance that turns the tide in favor of their team ‚Äì this season has something for everyone.

In conclusion: The stage is set, players are ready and fans eagerly wait for what could be one exciting ride! Major League Cricket 2024 ‚Äì Get ready for some adrenaline-pumping cricketing action!

title: Latest Cricket News on Grand prairie on Cricketnmore
body:
MLC Finals MVP Nicholas Pooran: The Major League Cricket (MLC) on Tuesday announced the schedule for the upcoming 2024 season, the second edition of a milestone event in the history of T20 cricket in the United States. The season promises an exhilarating lineup of matches featuring some of the world‚Äôs best international players and the nation‚Äôs top domestic talent.

Building on the momentum of its inaugural 2023 season, Major League Cricket (MLC) has extended the tournament, due to demand, adding an extra six league matches. The four-game playoff series, to be hosted in Grand Prairie, Texas, is set to captivate cricket fans across the globe.

The 2024 season will commence with two matches across the country on July 5, headlined by MLC‚Äôs reigning champions, MI New York, featuring their elite West Indian batter Kieron Pollard, facing the 2023 runners-up Seattle Orcas, led by star South African pair Wayne Parnell and Quinton de Kock. The match will be played at Church Street Park in Morrisville.
